5 Nights 6 Days Kashmir Package

Tour Overview

Kashmir holiday tour is incom plete without a houseboat stay in Srinagar Dal Lake. Enjoy and experience a unique stay at the finest houseboats on the popular Dal and Nigeen Lake. Our Kashmir Houseboat tour packages enable you to explore and enjoy authentic Kashmiri flavor with an experience of a lifetime.
